name: Heart Condition
tagline: A racist cop receives a heart transplant from a black lawyer he hates, who returns as a ghost to ask the cop to help take down the men who murdered him.

name: Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love
tagline: Two girlhood friends become sexual rivals at maturity.

name: The Raid: Redemption
tagline: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

name: This Boy's Life
tagline: The story about the relationship between a rebellious 50s teenager and his abusive father, based on the memoirs of writer and literature professor Tobias Wolff.

name: Life Stinks
tagline: A filthy rich businessman bets a corporate rival that he can live on the streets of L.A. without the comforts of home or money, which proves to be tougher than he thought.

name: Man Trouble
tagline: A sleazy but affable guard dog trainer is blackmailed to steal a manuscript for a tell-all book from one of his clients.

name: Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down!
Big Bully
tagline: A writer returns to his hometown where he faces the childhood nemesis whose life he ultimately ruined, only the bully wants to relive their painful past by torturing him once again.

name: Sea Rex 3D: Journey to a Prehistoric World
tagline: The T-Rex of the Seas come alive.

name: The Visual Bible: The Gospel of John
tagline: The story of Jesus' life as told by the apostle John, narrated by Christopher Plummer.

name: Tank Girl
tagline: Based on the British cult comic-strip, our tank-riding anti-heroine fights a mega-corporation, which controls the world's water supply.

name: Good Bye Lenin!
tagline: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.

name: Frances Ha
tagline: A story that follows a New York woman (who doesn't really have an apartment), apprentices for a dance company (though she's not really a dancer), and throws herself headlong into her dreams, even as their possibility dwindles.

name: Peter's Friends
tagline: Six former college friends, with two new friends, gather for a New Years Eve weekend reunion at a large English countryside manor after ten years to reminisce about the good times now long gone.

name: Secretary
tagline: A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.

name: Three Colors: Red
tagline: Final entry in a trilogy of films dealing with contemporary French society concerns a model who discovers her neighbour is keen on invading people's privacy.

name: Breaking the Waves
tagline: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

name: Bottle Shock
tagline: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris".

name: Bully
tagline: A documentary on peer-to-peer bullying in schools across America.

name: Please Give
tagline: In New York City, a husband and wife butt heads with the granddaughters of the elderly woman who lives in the apartment the couple owns.

name: Passed Away
tagline: A bunch of eccentric relatives gather for their patriarch's funeral.

name: My Name Is Khan
tagline: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President seriously, and embarks on a cross-country journey.

name: The Anniversary Party
tagline: Love is complex and relationships deteriorate.

name: Short Time
tagline: When a police detective thinks he is dying and learns that his life insurance pays out more if he dies in the line of duty, he tries to make that happen.

name: Safety Not Guaranteed
tagline: Three magazine employees head out on an assignment to interview a guy who placed a classified ad seeking a companion for time travel.

name: King's Ransom
tagline: Hoping to foil his own gold-digging wife's plan, a loathsome businessman arranges his own kidnapping, only to realize that there are plenty of other people interested in his wealth as well.

name: Idle Hands
tagline: Lazy Anton's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

name: Ladrón que roba a ladrón
tagline: Two former thieves reunite to rob the biggest thief they know -- Moctesuma Valdez, a TV infomercial guru who's made millions selling worthless health products to poor Latino immigrants. When none of their affiliates want to go undercover as day laborers to pull off the heist, the two men turn to the real thing for help.

name: I'm Not There.
tagline: Ruminations on the life of Bob Dylan, where six characters embody a different aspect of the musician's life and work.

name: Shame
tagline: In New York City, Brandon's carefully cultivated private life -- which allows him to indulge his sexual addiction -- is disrupted when his sister arrives unannounced for an indefinite stay.

name: American Ninja 2: The Confrontation
tagline: On a remote Caribbean island, Army Ranger Joe Armstrong investigates the disappearance of several marines, which leads him to The Lion, a super-criminal who has kidnapped a local scientist and mass-produced an army of mutant Ninja warriors.

name: Blood Feast
tagline: An Egyptian caterer kills various women in suburban Miami to use their body parts to bring to life a dormant Egyptian goddess, while an inept police detective try to track him down.

name: Cat People
tagline: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.

name: Jailhouse Rock
tagline: After serving time for manslaughter, young Vince Everett becomes a teenage rock star.

name: Godzilla 1985: The Legend Is Reborn
tagline: Thirty years after the original monster's rampage, a new Godzilla emerges and attacks Japan.

name: Dillinger
tagline: John Dillinger begins his life of crime as a petty thief, meets his future gang in prison and eventually masterminds a series of daring robberies.

name: Meet Wally Sparks
tagline: Wally Sparks is a tabloid TV show reporter who's trying to boost ratings on his show. He goes to the governor's mansion to uncover a sex scandal.

name: Gordy
tagline: A talking pig named Gordy becomes involved in a quest to save his family from the slaughterhouse.

name: P2
tagline: A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.

name: Welcome Home, Roxy Carmichael
tagline: A small town prepares for the homecoming of superstar Roxy Carmichael, as does a young outsider, who believes Roxy is her mother.

name: The Pebble and the Penguin
tagline: A lovable but introverted penguin named Hubie plans to present his betrothal pebble to the bird of his dreams.

name: Memories of Me
tagline: On his girlfriend's insistence, a disgruntled man tries to make peace with his high-spirited, street-smart and often irritatingly careless father, a failed actor who never quit his dream to be a success.

name: Young@Heart
tagline: A documentary on a chorus of senior citizens from Massachusetts who cover songs by Jimi Hendrix, Coldplay, Sonic Youth, and other unexpected musicians.

name: Playing by Heart
tagline: Eleven articulate people work through affairs of the heart in L.A.

name: The Phantom of the Opera
tagline: A darker version of the classic Gaston Leroux novel. A young soprano becomes the obsession of a horribly disfigured composer who has plans for those oppose himself or the young singer.

name: Charlie Bartlett
tagline: A rich kid becomes the self-appointed psychiatrist to the student body of his new high school.

name: Of Gods and Men
tagline: Under threat by fundamentalist terrorists, a group of Trappist monks stationed with an impoverished Algerian community must decide whether to leave or stay.

name: Manon of the Spring
tagline: A beautiful but shy shepherdess plots vengeance on the men whose greedy conspiracy to acquire her her father's land caused his death years earlier.

name: My Demon Lover
tagline: A homeless street musician becomes a demon when sexually aroused.

name: Earth Girls Are Easy
tagline: A spaceship with three furry aliens lands in a California girl's swimming pool, so she makes friends with them.

name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
tagline: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

name: Warlock: The Armageddon
tagline: The Son of Satan attempts to bring his father to Earth with the aid of some mystic stones.

name: The Manhattan Project
tagline: A teen and his girlfriend make an atomic bomb with plutonium stolen from a scientist dating his mother.

name: L'Auberge Espagnole

production.name: Ce Qui Me Meut Motion Pictures

tagline: A strait-laced French student moves into an apartment in Barcelona with a cast of six other characters from all over Europe. Together, they speak the international language of love and friendship.

name: Me and You and Everyone We Know
tagline: A lonely shoe salesman and an eccentric performance artist struggle to connect in this unique take on contemporary life.

name: My Chauffeur
tagline: A free-spirited young woman (Deborah Foreman) upsets the status quo at a stuffy Brentwood limousine service.

name: The Door in the Floor
tagline: A writer's young assistant becomes both pawn and catalyst in his boss's disintegrating household.

name: Melinda and Melinda
tagline: Two alternating stories about Melinda's (Mitchell) attempts to straighten out her life.

name: The September Issue
tagline: A documentary chronicling Vogue editor-in-chief Anna Wintour's preparations for the 2007 fall-fashion issue.

name: With a Friend Like Harry...
tagline: Harry knew Michel in high school; they meet again by accident, Harry inserts himself in Michel's life... and things take a sinister turn.

name: Critters 2
tagline: Eggs of the small, furry alien carnivores are left behind on Earth and, after hatching, set their appetites on the next neighboring town.

name: Wings of Desire
tagline: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

name: Better Luck Tomorrow
tagline: A group of over-achieving Asian-American high school seniors enjoy a power trip when they dip into extra-curricular criminal activities.

name: Bound
tagline: Corky, a tough female ex con and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caeser.

name: Lost Highway
tagline: After a bizarre encounter at a party, a jazz saxophonist is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to prison, where he inexplicably morphs into a young mechanic and begins leading a new life.

name: Barb Wire
tagline: Post-Apocalyptic remake of "Casablanca" set in a strip club.

name: Atanarjuat: The Fast Runner

production.name: Canada Television and Cable Production Fund License Program (CTCPF)
Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

tagline: The telling of an Inuit legend of an evil spirit causing strife in the community and one warrior's endurance and battle of its menace.

name: Paris Is Burning
tagline: A chronicle of New York's drag scene in the 1980s, focusing on balls, voguing and the ambitions and dreams of those who gave the era its warmth and vitality.

name: To Save a Life
tagline: After a childhood friend's death, Jake Taylor, an all-star athlete must change his life - and sacrifice his dreams to save the lives of others.

name: The Class
tagline: Teacher and novelist François Bégaudeau plays a version of himself as he negotiates a year with his racially mixed students from a tough Parisian neighborhood.
